data.title: Arrive at Barça like a great! Ilkay Gündogan, footballer of the year in Germany
data.meta_description: Ilkay Gündogan is crowning a sublime season in terms of distinctions.  The German player won the treble with Manchester City and has now earned one of Germany's most important individual awards: "Footballer of the Year"
data.text:
The Barça found in Ilkay Gündogan a true 'bargain' of market, when incorporating with letter of freedom to a player of world-wide quality contrasted. Although previously it showed a level stood out in his pasantías by the Borussia Dortmund and the Manchester City, this last campaign was his year of 'explosion' definite. Pep Guardiola has advanced it in the terrain of game, what has finished for benefiting it enormously. Further to having had a season of dream to level of clubs, now his talent also will be recognised with a prestigious lauro personal, the first of his career.

The germano was chosen like the "Footballer of the Year" by the German sportive magazine Kicker, after accumulating a total of 198 votes, the maximum possible punctuation. It surpassed to Niclas Füllkrug of the Werder Bremen, the one who obtained a total of 88 votes, and to Randal Kolo Muani of the Eintracht Frankfurt, the one who completed the podium with 69 points. It fits to stand out that the "Technician of the Year" was Urs Fischer, the one who carried for the first time in his history to the FC Union to the League of Champions.

Gündogan Arrived to the Barça after winning it everything with the Manchester City

The ex of the Borussia Dortmund had a season of dream with the Manchester City, leading to his team from the captaincy to attain the triplete: win the Premier League, the Glass of the League and the first Champions League in the history of the 'citizens'. The Teutonic was a key piece in the diagram of Guardiola along the season, contesting a total of 51 parties in which it converted 11 goals and delivered 7 assistances, being one of his campaigns more goleadoras in his path futbolística.
